statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.14}+{8.13}\right)}={28.54}\approx{28.54}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.13}\cdot{5.26}={42.7638}\approx{42.8}.
